title: Charming 5RM 2BR 1BA HW W&D TUFTS MBTA COMMUTER RAIL AVAIL NOW
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 48673582', 'Rent: $2,000 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 07/15/2022', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Parking:: street parking', 'PLEASE CALL 781-962-6615 WITH QUESTIONS OR TO SCHEDULE A VIEWING.', ' VIEWINGS CAN NOT BE SCHEDULED VIA EMAIL OR TEXT.', 'Great first-floor unit of an owner-occupied, two-family house on a quiet, residential side street just outside West Medford Square.', 'The unit features hardwood floors throughout and lots of natural woodwork.', 'There is a living room with a bowed window box.', 'There is a formal dining room with a built-in hutch.', ', 2 bedrooms, an updated bath, and an eat-in kitchen.', 'The kitchen features beautiful wood cabinets, a dishwasher, gas range.', 'and refrigerator.', 'Tenants can use the washer and dryer in the basement.', 'Additional storage in the basement as well.', 'Heat is oil and tenant pays all of their own utilities.', 'Street parking by permit.', ' Sorry, absolutely no pets.', 'his home is conveniently located just steps from the Commuter Rail stop in West Medford with super fast access to North Station in downtown Boston and points north towards Lowell.', 'Extensive bus services are just minutes away with service to Davis Sq.', '(Red Line), Sullivan Sq.', '(Orange Line), Lechmere Station (Green Line), and express service from West Medford to Haymarket Station in Government Center, Boston.', 'Traveling by car, route 93 is just minutes away.', 'All the shops, restaurants, and of West Medford are just moments from the front door making this the perfect location.', 'APPLICANTS MUST HAVE GOOD CREDIT!', 'Available NOW.', 'FEATURES', 'Dishwasher', 'Eat-in Kitchen', 'Hardwood Floors', 'High Ceiling', 'Laundry in Building', 'Modern Kitchen', 'New/Renovated Bath', 'Porch', 'Storage', 'Yard', 'Prices and availability are subject to change without notice.', ' Photos of managed buildings may be representative only and not of the actual unit
